com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.photostructures

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.photostructures.Tag

  • public class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
    Class the represent the info that the tag hold, the tag hold text (showed to user), id and the link of the tag. So we use this class to represent the tag in our application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String tagId
      The id of the tag
      private static java.lang.String tagLink
      Template of the url that include all the photos that contain the current tag
      private java.lang.String tagText
      The text that showed to the user

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tag(java.lang.String tagId, java.lang.String tagText)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getTagId()
      Return the id of the tag.
      java.lang.String getTagLink()
      Return the link of the tag, that contain all photos with this tag.
      java.lang.String getTagText()
      Return the text of the tag, the text showed to the user in the UI.
